metadata.link: .iabUnit .iabUnitLoader{margin:0 auto;font-size:10px;position:relative;text-indent:-9999em;border-top:1.1em solid rgba(51,51,51,.2);border-right:1.1em solid rgba(51,51,51,.2);border-bottom:1.1em solid rgba(51,51,51,.2);border-left:1.1em solid #fff;-webkit-transform:translateZ(0);-ms-transform:translateZ(0);transform:translateZ(0);-webkit-animation:iabUnitLoad8 1.1s infinite linear;animation:iabUnitLoad8 1.1s infinite linear}.iabUnit .iabUnitLoader,.iabUnit .iabUnitLoader:after{border-radius:50%;top:50%;left:50%;position:absolute;margin:-50px 0 0 -50px;width:100px;height:100px}.iabUnit #iabUnitInner.iabUnitInnerOpacity{opacity:0;min-height:415px}
